briefdescription.para: Values supported by the Pokit Pro's Range attributes in Capacitance mode.

xrefdescription.para: These Pokit Pro enumeration values are as-yet undocumented by Pokit Innovations. @pcolby reverse-engineered them as part of the dokit project.

briefdescription.para: Values supported by the Pokit Pro's Range attributes in *Current modes.

xrefdescription.para: These Pokit Pro enumeration values are as-yet undocumented by Pokit Innovations. @pcolby reverse-engineered them as part of the dokit project.

briefdescription.para: Values supported by the Pokit Pro's Range attributes in Resistance mode.

xrefdescription.para: These Pokit Pro enumeration values are as-yet undocumented by Pokit Innovations. @pcolby reverse-engineered them as part of the dokit project.

briefdescription.para: Values supported by the Pokit Pro's Range attributes in *Voltage modes.

xrefdescription.para: These Pokit Pro enumeration values are as-yet undocumented by Pokit Innovations. @pcolby reverse-engineered them as part of the dokit project.

briefdescription.para: Returns range as a user-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for range in (integer) nanofarads, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns range as a user-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for range in (integer) microamps, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns range as a user-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for range in (integer) ohms, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns range as a user-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for range in (integer) millivolts, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns range as a quint8 as a convenience for assigning to services' settings.range members.
Returns range as a quint8 as a convenience for assigning to services' settings.range members.
Returns range as a quint8 as a convenience for assigning to services' settings.range members.
Returns range as a quint8 as a convenience for assigning to services' settings.range members.
